parameters.name: CornerIndex
parameters.description: Index of corner to which to apply the corner relief; -1 to apply it to the corner last added with IFeatureManager::AddCornerReliefCorner

parameters.name: ReliefType
parameters.description: Type of corner relief as defined by swCornerReliefType_e

parameters.name: Length1
parameters.description: Not used

parameters.name: Length2
parameters.description: If ReliefType is swCornerReliefType_e... Then Length2 is the slot... swCornerSquareRelief Length of the corner relief swCornerObroundRelief Length of the corner relief swCornerCircularRelief Radius of the corner relief

parameters.name: Length3
parameters.description: If ReliefType is swCornerReliefType_e... Then Length3 is... swCornerObroundRelief Slot width of the corner relief swCornerSquareRelief and FilletedCorners = true Radius of filleted corner

parameters.name: CenterOnBendLines
parameters.description: True to center the corner relief relative to the bend lines, false to not; valid only if ReliefType is one of the following: swCornerReliefType_e.swCornerSquareRelief swCornerReliefType_e.swCornerCircularRelief swCornerReliefType_e.swCornerObroundRelief

parameters.name: RatioToThickness
parameters.description: True to use a ratio value to cut the bend area so that the body can be folded, false to not; the ratios for valid relief types are calculated as follows where t = thickness of sheet metal: If ReliefType is swCornerReliefType_e... Then ratios are... swCornerSquareRelief Length2/t swCornerCircularRelief Length2/t swCornerObroundRelief Length2/t and Length3/t

parameters.name: TangentToBend
parameters.description: True to make the corner relief tangent to the inside bend edges, false to not

parameters.name: AddFilletedCorners
parameters.description: True to fillet the corner relief corners, false to not; valid only if ReliefType = swCornerReliefType_e.swCornerSquareRelief

parameters.name: NarrowCorner
parameters.description: True to use the algorithm for large bend radii to narrow the corner relief in the bend area, false to not; valid only if ReliefType is one of the following: swCornerReliefType_e.swCornerSquareRelief swCornerReliefType_e.swCornerCircularRelief swCornerReliefType_e.swCornerObroundRelief

title: IFeatureManager.AddCornerReliefType
description: Specifies the type of corner relief to apply to the specified corner of the selected sheet metal body.
signature:
System.Boolean AddCornerReliefType( 
   System.Int32
CornerIndex
,
   System.Int32
ReliefType
,
   System.Double
Length1
,
   System.Double
Length2
,
   System.Double
Length3
,
   System.Boolean
CenterOnBendLines
,
   System.Boolean
RatioToThickness
,
   System.Boolean
TangentToBend
,
   System.Boolean
AddFilletedCorners
,
   System.Boolean
NarrowCorner
)

parameters.name: CornerIndex
parameters.description: Index of corner to which to apply the corner relief; -1 to apply it to the corner last added with IFeatureManager::AddCornerReliefCorner

parameters.name: ReliefType
parameters.description: Type of corner relief as defined by swCornerReliefType_e

parameters.name: Length1
parameters.description: Not used

parameters.name: Length2
parameters.description: If ReliefType is swCornerReliefType_e... Then Length2 is the slot... swCornerSquareRelief Length of the corner relief swCornerObroundRelief Length of the corner relief swCornerCircularRelief Radius of the corner relief

parameters.name: Length3
parameters.description: If ReliefType is swCornerReliefType_e... Then Length3 is... swCornerObroundRelief Slot width of the corner relief swCornerSquareRelief and FilletedCorners = true Radius of filleted corner

parameters.name: CenterOnBendLines
parameters.description: True to center the corner relief relative to the bend lines, false to not; valid only if ReliefType is one of the following: swCornerReliefType_e.swCornerSquareRelief swCornerReliefType_e.swCornerCircularRelief swCornerReliefType_e.swCornerObroundRelief

parameters.name: RatioToThickness
parameters.description: True to use a ratio value to cut the bend area so that the body can be folded, false to not; the ratios for valid relief types are calculated as follows where t = thickness of sheet metal: If ReliefType is swCornerReliefType_e... Then ratios are... swCornerSquareRelief Length2/t swCornerCircularRelief Length2/t swCornerObroundRelief Length2/t and Length3/t

parameters.name: TangentToBend
parameters.description: True to make the corner relief tangent to the inside bend edges, false to not

parameters.name: AddFilletedCorners
parameters.description: True to fillet the corner relief corners, false to not; valid only if ReliefType = swCornerReliefType_e.swCornerSquareRelief

parameters.name: NarrowCorner
parameters.description: True to use the algorithm for large bend radii to narrow the corner relief in the bend area, false to not; valid only if ReliefType is one of the following: swCornerReliefType_e.swCornerSquareRelief swCornerReliefType_e.swCornerCircularRelief swCornerReliefType_e.swCornerObroundRelief

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks:
To create a corner relief feature:
Call
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
with Mark = 0 and Append = true to select the sheet metal body in which to create a corner relief feature.
Call IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2 with Mark = 4 and Append = true to select two faces that form a bend corner.
Call
IFeatureManager::AddCornerReliefCorner
to add the corner to the corner relief feature.
Call this method to specify the corner relief for the corner.
Repeat steps 2 - 4 to add another corner to the corner relief feature.
Call
IFeatureManager::FinishCornerRelief
.
